original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 10.11. Vipākattikādi, Hetuduka
analyzed: vipākattika ādi

original: Navipākaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… navipākadhammadhammaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na vipākam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na vipāka dhamma dhammam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na nevavipāka na vipāka dhamma dhammam na hetum dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā bāttiṁsa, ārammaṇe sattavīsa, adhipatiyā ekūnatiṁsa …pe… aññamaññe tiṁsa …pe… vipāke pañcavīsa …pe… avigate bāttiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā bāttisa ārammaṇe sattavīsa adhipatiyā ekūnatisa pe aññamaññe tisa pe vipāke pañcavīsa pe avigate bāttisa

original: Naupādinnupādāniyaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naanupādinnupādāniyaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naanupādinnaanupādāniyaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na aupādinnupādāniyam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na anupādinnupādāniyam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na anupādinna anupādāniyam na hetum dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… āsevane sattarasa …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa adhipatiyā ekavīsa pe āsevane sattarasa pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na a saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na a saṅkiliṭṭha asaṅkilesikam na hetum dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke ekavīsa pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Nasavitakkasavicāraṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naavitakkavicāramattaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naavitakkaavicāraṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sa vitakka sa vicāram na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na avitakka vicāra mattam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na avitakka avicāram na hetum dhammam paṭicca

original: Hetuyā aṭṭhacattālīsa, ārammaṇe pañcacattālīsa, adhipatiyā sattacattālīsa …pe… purejāte āsevane catucattālīsa …pe… avigate aṭṭhacattālīsa.
analyzed: hetuyā aṭṭhacattālīsa ārammaṇe pañcacattālīsa adhipatiyā sattacattālīsa pe purejāte āsevane catucattālīsa pe avigate aṭṭhacattālīsa

original: Napītisahagataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasukhasahagataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naupekkhāsahagataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na pīti sahagatam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na sukha sahagatam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na upekkhā sahagatam na hetum dhammam paṭicca

original: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ nahetuṁ
analyzed: na dassanena pahātabbam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na bhāvanāya pahātabbam na hetu

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca pe na na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbam na hetum dhammam paṭicca

original: …pe… nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ
analyzed: pe na dassanena pahātabba hetukam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetuka

original: nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ nahetuṁ
analyzed: na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam na hetu

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā ekatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Naācayagāmiṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naapacayagāmiṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na ācaya gāmim na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na apacaya gāmim na hetum dhammam paṭicca

original: …pe… nanevācayagāmināpacayagāmiṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
analyzed: pe na neva ācaya gāminā apacaya gāmim na hetum dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā

original: ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Nasekkhaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naasekkhaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ
analyzed: na sekkham na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na asekkham na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na nevasekkha na asekkha

original: nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe…
analyzed: na hetum dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe

original: vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Naparittaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… namahaggataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naappamāṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na parittam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na mahaggatam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na appamāṇam na hetum dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā bāttiṁsa, ārammaṇe sattavīsa …pe… aññamaññe tiṁsa …pe… purejāte āsevane catuvīsa.
analyzed: hetuyā bāttisa ārammaṇe sattavīsa pe aññamaññe tisa pe purejāte āsevane catuvīsa

original: Naparittārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… namahaggatārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naappamāṇārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na paritta ārammaṇam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na mahaggata ārammaṇam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na appamāṇa ārammaṇam na hetum dhammam paṭicca

original: Nahīnaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… namajjhimaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… napaṇītaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hīnam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na majjhimam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na paṇītam na hetum dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa … vipāke ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa vipāke ekavīsa pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Namicchattaniyataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasammattaniyataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naaniyataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na micchatta niyatam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na sammatta niyatam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na aniyatam na hetum dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Namaggārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… namaggahetukaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… namaggādhipatiṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na magga ārammaṇam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na magga hetukam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na magga adhipatim na hetum dhammam paṭicca

original: Naanuppannaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nauppādiṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na anuppannam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na auppādim na hetum dhammam paṭicca

original: Naatītaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naanāgataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na atītam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na anāgatam na hetum dhammam paṭicca

original: Naatītārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naanāgatārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… napaccuppannārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na atīta ārammaṇam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na anāgata ārammaṇam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na paccuppanna ārammaṇam na hetum dhammam paṭicca

original: Naajjhattaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nabahiddhā nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na ajjhattam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na bahiddhā na hetum dhammam paṭicca

original: Naajjhattārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nabahiddhārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na ajjhatta ārammaṇam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pe na bahiddha ārammaṇam na hetum dhammam paṭicca
